API_Description: Gets the quads list for the th word on the page. The `quads` property of the `Annotation` object can be used for constructing text markup, underline, strikeout, highlight and squiggly annotations. See also getPageNthWord , getPageNumWords , and selectPageNthWord .

nPage.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the page. The default is 0, the first page in the document.

nWord.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the word. The default is 0, the first word on the page.

Returns: The quads list for the th word on the page.
Examples:
Underline the fifth word on the second page of a document.

```
var annot = this.addAnnot({
    page: 1,
    type: "Underline",
    quads:  this.getPageNthWordQuads(1, 4),
    author: "A. C. Robat",
    contents: "Fifth word on second page"
});
```

See `spell.` checkWord for an additional example.
